name: A Phaser Building Tower Game
description:
A game made for a course, under Phaser 3.

The music was done by Prolofique, if you liked it, please follow his youtube channel : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVpEvxxlkiVtnDQ9RjXGBEQ

The art was made by me.

Hope you enjoy it!
Please leave your highscore in the comments !
And tell me if you find a bug (I know there are some..)
